Title: Authorizes the county of Nassau to extend the lease or permit on the park lands it was previously authorized to lease pursuant to chapter 269 of the laws of 1979
Summary: Authorizes the county of Nassau to extend the lease or permit on the park lands it was previously authorized to lease.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 269 of the laws of 1979 relating to authorizing the county of Nassau to lease certain lands acquired pursuant to the provisions of article fifteen of the parks and recreation law, in relation to extending the authorization to lease or permit such lands
